translations: 满意的，满足的；确信的，信服的
使满意；满足（要求、需要等）；使确信（satisfy 的过去式和过去分词形式）

sentences.sentence: We are not satisfied with these results.
sentences.translation: 我们对这些结果不满意。

sentences.sentence: Like so many creative people, he was never satisfied.
sentences.translation: 正如许多有创造力的人一样，他永不满足。

sentences.sentence: Responses were graded from 1 (very satisfied) to 5 (not at all satisfied).
sentences.translation: 回答按1（非常满意）到5（完全不满意）分类。
